common.intro: رێکخراوێکی مرۆی ناحوکمیە کە لە پۆلەندا وڵاتانی دیکە کاردەکات
common.page_not_found: ئەو لاپەرەیی کە بەدوای دەگەرێی بونی نیە
common.unexpected_error: هەڵەیەکی چاوەروان نەکراو, هەڵەیەکی چاوەروان نەکراو رویدا تکایە پەیوەندی بە بەشی کارگێری

drive_form.drive_added_offline_notification: Drive will be added to database after restoring connection to the internet
drive_form.drive_added_online_notification: Drive was successfully added to database

passenger_form.invalid_length: Driver code should be of length 6

drives.no_driver_drives: You have no drives stored in database. You can add a new drive by choosing option from the menu.
drives.unverified_drive: This drive was not verified, contact with a person from PAH responsible for drives to solve it.

logout.offline_logout_warning: You are offline, so if you log out right now then you won't be able to log in until you become online again.
logout.logout_warning: You will be able to log back in only if will be online!

refresh.new_version: A new version of website is available.

confirmation.submission_success: Your confirmation was sent. Thank you!
confirmation.token_inactive: Your link expired or has already been confirmed. Thank you!
